= Discussion Overview =

==In this page you have two tabs: ==

In My Discussions you can see all the forums in which you are a member.

In All Discussions you can see all the forums except the ones which are private.

==In the left of the screen there are three lists:==

In Most Read Discussions you see the 5 discussions that were viewed most.

In New Discussions you see the 5 discussions that were most recently created.

In Most Active Discussions you see the 5 discussions that have more topics.
